subject: Login issue after password reset
description: I reset my password yesterday following the instructions in the email. Now I'm trying to log in with the new password but keep getting an 'Invalid credentials' error. I've tried multiple times and I'm sure I'm typing the correct password.

subject: Missing order confirmation
description: I placed an order (ID: ORD-78945) two days ago but haven't received any confirmation email. My credit card was charged $89.99. Can you please check if my order went through?
